          <title>
            <string language="en">Exploding satellite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Explodierender Satellit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Satellite éclatant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélite explodindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satellite d'esplosione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφόρος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélite que estalla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an exploding satellite. People on Earth can see it explode but cannot hear it because sound cannot travel through empty space.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">explosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light empty space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen explodierenden 
Satelliten. Leute auf Masse können, sie sehen zu explodieren 
aber können nicht sie hören, weil der Schall nicht durch leeren 
Platz fortpflanzen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un satellite éclatant. 
Les gens sur terre peuvent la voir éclater mais ne peuvent pas 
l'entendre parce que le bruit ne peut pas voyager par l'espace vide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um satélite explodindo. 
Os povos na terra podem vê-la explodir mas não podem ouvi-la 
porque o som não pode viajar através do espaço vazio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un satellite 
d'esplosione. La gente su terra può vederla esplodere ma non 
può sentirla perché il suono non può attraversare through spazio 
vuoto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δορυφόρο. Οι 
άνθρωποι στη γη μπορούν να δουν αυτό το εκρήγνυνται 
αλλά δεν μπορούν να ακούσουν επειδή ο ήχος δεν μπορεί να 
ταξιδεψει μέσω του κενού διαστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un satélite que 
estalla. La gente en la tierra puede verla estallar pero no 
puede oírla porque el sonido no puede viajar a través de espacio 
vacío.</string>
          </description>
